name: The Artifact
description: Woken from a hypersleep, you find yourself alone on a drifting star cruiser, light years from home. The crew has disappeared, leaving behind nothing but a few scattered records and a strange artifact that seems to hold the key to an alien civilisation.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWSÂ® 7 or later Processor: Dual core recommended Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb VRAM recommended DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 694 MB available space
